Package eu.mihosoft.freerouting.board

Class PullTightAlgo

java.lang.Object
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.board.PullTightAlgo
public abstract class PullTightAlgo extends Object
Class with functionality for optimising traces and vias.

    Description
    protected Polyline
    avoid_acid_traps(Polyline p_polyline)
    Wraps around pins of the own net to avoid acid traps.
    protected boolean
    is_stop_requested()
    Termitates the pull tight algorithm, if the user has made a stop request.
    protected Line
    reposition_line(Line[] p_line_arr, int p_no)
    Tries to reposition the line with index p_no to make the polyline consisting of p_line_arr shorter.
